members.name: getRowsForPaths
members.comment: Returns the rows that the TreePath instances in path are being displayed at. The receiver should return an array of the same length as that passed in, and if one of the TreePaths in path is not valid its entry in the array should be set to -1.

return: the rows that the TreePath instances in path are being displayed at

name: javax.swing.tree.RowMapper
comment: Defines the requirements for an object that translates paths in the tree into display rows.
